channel.title: PowerScape
channel.description:
A Brand New RSPS in ALPHA-Testing stage We are a small server not yet 24/7 but will be with the help Of loyal players who wish to give back to what we offer. A 317 frame with 614 items. Custom Items We need some testers also.
Epic features include: Corporal Beast KBD Dagonnoth kings Tormented Demons GodWars Dungeons Duel Arena Barrows Pest Control TzTok-Jad Much Much More!
Join forums at [url=http://www.powerscape.tk]http://www.powerscape.tk[/url] Download link under forums.
Staff List for help in-game: Usernames: Owner- Santa Admins- Joseph, Nigitynignig Moderator- God of Peace

item.title: PowerScape
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

tompacman:

This advertisement is short and to the point, how about grow a pair and just tell me out right that its a bad advertisement instead of hiding behind your computers all day throwing out insults like a 10 year old school girl.

This is a bad advertisement.

Btw, arham is actually 11 so you weren’t too far off with the age on him, however, add 6 years to that for myself.

Read full topic

This advertisement is short and to the point, how about grow a pair and just tell me out right that its a bad advertisement instead of hiding behind your computers all day throwing out insults like a 10 year old school girl.

Actually I am a…

tompacman:

This advertisement is short boring and to the point, how about grow a pair and just tell me out right that its a bad advertisement instead of hiding behind your computers all day throwing out insults like a 10 11 year old school girl boy.

And also, this ad could be okay if it had some color and 2 pictures. Add that and your ad will be the best.
